disease: Unspecified malignant neoplasm of skin of left upper eyelid, including canthus

physical_findings: Lesion on the left upper eyelid, possibly involving the canthus

required: Histopathological confirmation of malignant neoplasm of skin
supportive: Clinical findings consistent with a skin lesion on the left upper eyelid, including canthus

differential_diagnoses: Malignant neoplasm of skin of genital organs (C51-C52, C60.-, C63.2)
